Name: Salt Cure
Effect: Single Target. Ranged. Ongoing Damage. Duration 4 Rounds. Steel-Type and Water-Type Pokemon receive Super-Effective Damage from this Move and 1 Extra Damage from the Ongoing Damage.
Description: The user covers the foe with a salt crust. The salt will irritate the skin and start desiccating the victim. It can even rust metal in a few seconds.
